channel.description: The mailserver suite with the 'moo' – 🐮 + 🐋 = 💕 | Official Blog Page

item.title: 🌌🐮 Mooay 2022 Update - The Tag Update | Changelog
item.author: Niklas Meyer
item.description: Here, the new mailcow update 2022-05 is! Yoda, in a parallel universe Anyway… this month we have new stuff for your mailcow again. So let´s get started, shall we? What is new? Tags Thanks to the help of @FredleSpl0it the mailcow now has tags. Tags? Yes tags! These can be used for filtering and searching. You can add them either by editing a domain/mailbox or by creating a new one.
